requirementText.name: Previous archival reference code
requirementText.description: In cases where the SIP originates from other institutions maintaining a reference code structure, this element can be used to record these reference codes and therefore support the provenance of the package when a whole archival description is not submitted with the submission. @TYPE is used with the value "PREVIOUSREFERENCECODE". Example: SE/FM/123/123.1/123.1.3 See also: Alternative record ID's, https://earksip.dilcis.eu/#VocabularyaltrecordIDTYPE.

testCase.description: mets/metsHdr/altRecordID[@TYPE='PREVIOUSREFERENCECODE'] MAY exist. If mets/metsHdr/altRecordID[@TYPE='PREVIOUSREFERENCECODE'] exists then it MUST have a text node that records a reference code that was used for the SIP in the institution where it originated from.

error.message: mets/metsHdr/altRecordID[@TYPE='PREVIOUSREFERENCECODE'] does not exist. MAY be: mets/metsHdr/altRecordID[@TYPE='PREVIOUSREFERENCECODE'] exists and its text records a reference code that was used for the SIP in the institution where it originated from.
